issue.title: [CI] Fix archery option in pandas master cron test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8740](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8740). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The --no-cache-leaf option was renamed to --no-leaf-cache.

comments.body:
